New Records: Shubman Gill scored 126* off 63 balls, which is a significant individual performance.
Key Match Events: Hardik Pandya took 4 wickets for 16 runs.
Umran Malik took 2 wickets for 9 runs.
Shivam Mavi took 2 wickets for 12 runs.
Arshdeep Singh took 2 wickets for 16 runs.
Pre-Game Insights: India elected to bat first after winning the toss.
Post-Match Reflections: Shubman Gill was named Player of the Match.
Hardik Pandya was named Player of the Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Narendra Modi Stadium, Ahmedabad.
Ben Lister made his T20I debut.
